attributes.action: Outlaw obscene bonuses to Bank employees for just doing their job
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I think it is pretty obvious what this petition is targeted at.  This government is both financially and morally bankrupt.  I have been apolitical for almost 30 years but the performance and behaviour of the current government has driven me out of my shell.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
